core:value.tools:description: This server process will execute when a due date is reached. Perhaps with a new symbol. Need to be able to calculate trigger time or pass in.
This is the entry point for HHT count data coming in. This should time out and alert.

core:value.core:name: Start HHT Count
core:value.core:jobHeader: Start HHT Count (Stock Take ID: #{stockTakeId}, Location: #{locationId})

core:value.core:jobHeader: Await HHT Count (Stock Take ID: #{stockTakeId}, Location: #{locationId})

core:value.core:name: Count Not Performed Alert
core:value.core:jobHeader: Count Not Performed Alert (Stock Take ID: #{stockTakeId})

core:value.core:name: Generate Stock Take Summary PDF
core:value.core:description: Server process to generate stock take summary PDF, which may be printed by a separate process

core:value.core:name: Print PDF File
core:value.core:description: Server process to print PDF File

core:value.core:name: Update Stock Take Status To Counted
Print PDF Error
